12 template<typename data_type>class Lookup {
13 public:
20  Lookup(const data_type * table, int size){
21  table_ = table;

24 
31  data_type value(data_type x){
32  unsigned int p1, p2;
33  unsigned int i;
34  data_type delta_x, delta_y;
35  data_type output;
36 
37  i = 0;
38  while( (x >= table_[i+2]) && (i < (size_-2)*2) ){
39  i+=2;
40  }
41 
42  p1 = i;
43  p2 = i+2;
44 
45  //now calculate the slope between the y values
46  delta_x = table_[p1] - table_[p2];
47  if( delta_x == 0 ){
48  return -1;
49  }
50  delta_y = table_[p1+1] - table_[p2+1];
51  output = ((x - table_[p1]) * delta_y) / delta_x + table_[p1+1];
52 
53  return output;
54  }
55 
56 private:
57  const data_type * table_;
58  unsigned int size_;
59 };
60 
61 };
